meanings.definition: To carry out a systematic or formal inquiry to discover and examine the facts of (an incident, allegation, etc.) so as to establish the truth.
meanings.sent1: The detective investigated the crime scene thoroughly.
meanings.sent2: The police investigated the missing person's case.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat investigated the new toy with great interest.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes investigated every detail of the painting, trying to unravel its mystery.
meanings.sent5: The scientist investigated the strange phenomenon, hoping to unlock its secrets.

meanings.definition: To conduct an inquiry or examination into.
meanings.sent1: The journalist investigated the corruption scandal for her article.
meanings.sent2: The committee investigated the safety measures in the workplace.
meanings.sent3: The kids investigated the strange noise coming from the attic, armed with flashlights.
meanings.sent4: His mind investigated the possibilities, searching for a solution to the problem.
meanings.sent5: The explorer investigated the ancient ruins, uncovering hidden treasures.
